Comments_List: I learned the basic fundamentals of a macroeconomic economy.
I learned a lot about the Great Recession and economic models in general.

Strengths - professor was a great teacher. 

Weakness - maybe some more office hour times. I was unable to attend office hours due to athletic conflict and I would have enjoyed attending those office hours.
Provide more resources to students during summer such as office hours or tutors
I would because the Professor is a very good teacher. The online videos were also laid out in an organized fashion which made learning before the lectures easier to follow.
Yes because you learn a lot of theory AND real history, both from the Great Depression and the Great Recession.
